result.reason: The feature request is to add column sorting to the IP scan grid. The underlying control (ObjectListView) supports this, and it can be enabled with configuration.
result.approach: Set olvHosts.CanSort = true and olvHosts.ShowSortIndicators = true in PortScanWindow.Designer.cs to enable sorting functionality and visual indicators for the MrngListView displaying IP scan results.
